author: nero
short: Create word clouds from text channel content (Refactored).
description:
Create word clouds from text channel content. Refactored version with bug fixes and improvements.

Original cog by FlapJack and aikaterna.

Dependencies: WordCloud :: https://github.com/amueller/word_cloud
install_msg: Thanks for installing WordCloudRe - the refactored WordClouds cog with fixes and improvements!
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store data or metadata about users.
